title: Executors
description: Executors are responsible for taking a task and executing it in a certain place in a certain way. For example, the local executor invokes the task on the userâ€™s local computer. Users can define custom executors to make Covalent compatible with any remote backend system and covalent has a wide range of executor plugin libraries that connects to various resources from local Slurm cluster to cloud based AWS/GCP/Azure resources.
